fullText:
Predatory Spirit

Paragon Tier
Prerequisite: Shifter, longtooth shifting or razorclaw shifting racial power, any primal class
Benefit: When you use longtooth shifting or razorclaw shifting, once before the end of your next turn you can reroll one attack roll with a primal attack power that misses and take either result.

Published in Dragon Magazine 387, page(s) 49.
name: Predatory Spirit
